sections.Map your route to your chosen degree: Our undergraduate programmes give you flexibility in terms of duration, disciplines, minors, and majors. You can study four years for a renowned accounting or business degree, or go the extra mile for a much sought-after double degree in as little as four years.
sections.Immerse yourself in a truly vibrant camp: With our truly holistic approach to education, beyond coursework and grades, you can also develop your leadership potential, hone your problem-solving ability, and give back to the community.
sections.Get in-demand skills for today’s digital: Taught by domain experts from NTU, our programmes integrate cutting-edge digital and data analytics components, including AI, machine learning, blockchain, and data visualisation.
sections.Gain work experience as you study: Thanks to our close industry ties, a world of internship, mentoring, and networking opportunities awaits, across every field, from finance to engineering and logistics.
sections.Kickstart your career from the get-go: Our expert recruitment team will help to map your career journey, build your professional network, and land roles that best fit your skills, interests, and values.
sections.Student life @ NBS: At Nanyang Business School, Student Life goes beyond the classroom, offering an environment for holistic development. With access to leadership roles, internships, exchange programs, and competitions, students can expand their horizons both personally and professionally. Ready to level up your NBS experience and see what’s in store? Click here to find out more Learn More
sections.Navigate your career @ NBS: Launch your dream career with NBS ACE, where comprehensive support begins from day one. Our dedicated career team takes a holistic approach, providing personalized planning, structured guidance, and expert resources to help undergraduate students discover and develop their career passions, empowering them to navigate their career preparation with confidence. Learn More
sections.A Global Alumni Community @ NBS: Build meaningful connections within an extraordinary community of diverse professionals, business leaders, entrepreneurs and innovators teeming with collective knowledge and experience across countries and industries. Game-changing opportunities are available for alumni to guide undergraduates in their educational and career journeys through mentorship and internship programmes, as well as at events organised through the NBS Alumni Relations Office. Learn More
sections.Charles Teo: There is no doubt that the structured and comprehensive programme at NBS has been instrumental to Charles' holistic development, and what he has achieved in three years.
sections.Zhu Jia Hui: Third year accountancy student Zhu Jia Hui talks about her favourite modules from the Interdisciplinary Collaborative Core Curriculum that give her an edge in the working world.
sections.Sitti Nurarfazirah: Sitti Nurarfazirah has some tips to help you navigate the opportunities and challenges that lie ahead.
sections.Cleo Sim: Explore your interests, reach out to experts, and broaden your network to enter the working world advises second year NBS student Cleo Sim.
sections.Maggie Lo: Working towards a Double Degree in Accountancy and Business, Maggie Lo shares the ins and outs of student life at NTU.
sections.Ray Gin: NBS undergrad Ray Gin takes on multiple internships to get real-world experience and discover his true calling.
sections.Charlene Ang: Charlene from NBS takes on the challenge of URECA, a unique opportunity for undergraduates to conduct hands-on, independent research under the mentorship of a faculty member of choice, over a period of 11 months.
sections.Yim Chieh Ying: Actuarial Science student Yim Chieh Ying gives a first-hand account of the benefits of the Work-Study Programme.
